projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: My first portfolio webstie that I designed and built in 2023, using Bootstrap. Through this project, I gained a deeper understanding of web development.

projects.title: Sourdough Busan
projects.description: A website for discovering the sourdough bakeries in Busan, South Korea. I used Naver Map API to get a map and display key bakery locations along with relevant information. With i18next, the website offers language options in both Korean and English for both local and international users.

projects.title: Conan Gray Unofficial Webiste
projects.description: Conan Gray's fan-made unofficial website. In honor of his 3rd studio album release, Found Heaven, I will recreate his website

responsibilities: Developed and executed Email newsletters, showcasing skills in content creation and management.
Proposed A/B testing for Email subject lines, resulting in a remarkable 300% increase in open rates.
Achieved promotion within a ten-month timeframe in recognition of outstanding performance.
Strategically optimized paid media campaigns and created compelling ad content for platforms like Facebook and Google.
Provided in-depth campaign analysis reports and conducted research on advertising trends.
Successfully introduced a new type of video ads, resulting in a remarkable 360% increase in sales, accompanied by a 260% boost in click-through rate (CTR).
